The Decree was entered on September 25, 2015.    Known lot: Lot # 251114, 240614

product_description: Moor Herbs Healthy Beauty Angel Formula packed in 16oz. plastic containers
reason_for_recall: Product is marketed as an infant formula but the required pre-market infant formula notification for this product has not been submitted to the FDA.    Product tested by FDA was well above the maximum acceptable range for Iron, Potassium and Sodium, which could potentially lead to iron overload and/or electrolyte imbalances. In addition, the product did not have vitamin D, and a vitamin D deficiency can potentially lead to rickets, a softening and weakening of bones.
code_info: All products.  Product does not have any lot code information.
